      • edges

        protected java.util.List<PairIntArray> edges
        edges extracted from image. if an instance of PairIntArrayWithColor is present, that holds a color field in which a value of '1' means the curve is closed.

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> highChangeEdges
        when making the corner list for the purpose of using them as stable features to identify in other images, may want to exclude corners that are in this list, highChanges.

    • Method Detail

      • doNotPerformHistogramEqualization

        public void doNotPerformHistogramEqualization()
        apply histogram normalization before processing. For some images, this will increase the contrast of fainter features.

      • useLowestHighIntensityCutoff

        public void useLowestHighIntensityCutoff()

        public void useLowHighIntensityCutoff()

      • useLineDrawingMode

        public void useOutdoorMode()

      • useSegmentationForSky

        public void useSegmentationForSky()
        use segmentation to try to reduce the sky to one color which makes the horizon features such as peaks more visible. This method has the side effects of disabling histogram equalization and setting the intensity for the higher threshold in the 2-layer filter of the Canny Edge filter to a lower value than normal. Note that "line drawing" mode should probably not be used with this, but hasn't been tested yet.

        protected void initialize()
